
/* BASIC Progrma*/
1) Display Hello World
package Orangeit;

public class helloword {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
System.out.println("Hello World");
	}

}

2)Addition of 2 numbers

package Orangeit;

public class Additionof5number {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1=21,n2=45,sum;
       sum=n1+n2;
       System.out.println("sum="+sum);
		
		
		
	}

}

3)Substraction
package Orangeit;

public class substractiontwonumber {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int firstnumber=34,secondnumber =31,sub;
		sub=firstnumber-secondnumber;
		System.out.println("Sum Of Two Number="+sub);
		
	}
}

4)Division
package Orangeit;

public class Divisionoftwonumber {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int firstnumber=34,secondnumber =31,div;
		div=firstnumber+secondnumber;
		System.out.println("Sum Of Two Number="+div);
		
	}
}

5)multiplication
package Orangeit;

public class multiplicationoftwonumber {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int firstnumber=34,secondnumber =31,mul;
		mul=firstnumber*secondnumber;
		System.out.println("Multiplication Of Two Number="+mul);
		
	}
}
              
6)addition of 5 no
package Orangeit;

public class Additionof5number {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1=21,n2=45,n3=2,n4=45,n5=23,sum;
       sum=n1+n2+n3+n4+n5;
       System.out.println("sum="+sum);
		
		
		
	}

}

7)addition of 7 no
package Orangeit;

public class Additionof7number {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1=21,n2=45,n3=2,n4=45,n5=23,n6=33,n7=32,sum;
       sum=n1+n2+n3+n4+n5+n6+n7;
       System.out.println("sum="+sum);
		
		
		
	}

}


8)Multiplication of 4 no.
package Orangeit;

public class multiplicationofournumber {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int firstnumber=34,secondnumber =31,thirdnumber=21,fourthnumber=23,mul;
		mul=firstnumber*secondnumber*thirdnumber*fourthnumber;
		System.out.println("Multiplication Of Four Number="+mul);
		
	}
}
              
9)Substraction
package Orangeit;

public class Substractionf2number {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1,n2,sub;
	   Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
	   System.out.println("Enter Two Number");
	   n1=s.nextInt();
	   n2=s.nextInt();
       sum=n1-n2;
       System.out.println("sub="+sub);
		
		
		
	}

}

10)Addition
package Orangeit;

public class Additionof2number {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1,n2,sum;
	   Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
	   System.out.println("Enter Two Number");
	   n1=s.nextInt();
	   n2=s.nextInt();
       sum=n1+n2;
       System.out.println("sum="+sum);
		
		
		
	}

}
11)division
package Orangeit;

public class divisionof2number {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1,n2,div;
	   Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
	   System.out.println("Enter Two Number");
	   n1=s.nextInt();
	   n2=s.nextInt();
       sum=n1/n2;
       System.out.println("div="+div);
		
		
		
	}

}
12)Addition of 5 numbers.
package Orangeit;
public class divisionof2number
{
public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1,n2,n3,n4,n5,sum;
	   Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
	   System.out.println("Enter Seven Number");
	   n1=s.nextInt();
	   n2=s.nextInt();
	    n3=s.nextInt();
	   n4=s.nextInt();
	    n5=s.nextInt();
	
       sum=n1+n2+n3+n4+n5;
       System.out.println("sum="+sum);
	   }
}
13)Addition of 7 numbers.
package Orangeit;
public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1,n2,n3,n4,n5,n6,n7,sum;
	   Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
	   System.out.println("Enter Two Number");
	   n1=s.nextInt();
	   n2=s.nextInt();
	    n3=s.nextInt();
	   n4=s.nextInt();
	    n5=s.nextInt();
	
       sum=n1+n2+n3+n4+n5+n6+n7;
       System.out.println("sum="+sum);
	   }
 }

14)Multiplication of 4 numbers
package Orangeit;
public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int n1,n2,n3,n4,mul;
	   Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
	   System.out.println("Enter Two Number");
	   n1=s.nextInt();
	   n2=s.nextInt();
	    n3=s.nextInt();
	   n4=s.nextInt();
	    n5=s.nextInt();
	
       mul=n1*n2*n3*n4;
       System.out.println("mul="+mul);
	   }
 }
 
 14)Area of Circle
 package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p6 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int r;
		 double pi=3.14,area,Circumference;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter R value:");
		r=s.nextInt();
		area=pi*(r*r);
		Circumference=2*pi*r;
		System.out.println("Area of  Circle="+area);
		System.out.println("Circumference of circle ="+Circumference);
		
	}

}

15)area of Rectangle

16)Area of triangle

package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p21 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		float b,h,A;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter  B & H value :");
		b=s.nextFloat();
		h=s.nextFloat();
		 A = (b * h) / 2;
		 System.out.println("Area Of Triangle :"+A);
		}

}


17)Kinetic Energy
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p10 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int m,g,h,v,e;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter m,g,h,v ");
		m=s.nextInt();
		g=s.nextInt();
		h=s.nextInt();
		v=s.nextInt();
		e=(m*g*h)+(1/2)*(m*v*v);
		System.out.println("E="+e);

	}

}


18)Potential Energy
pe=m*g*h;
i/p m,g,h
o/p pe

19)Arithmetic mean & harmonic mean
am=(a+b)/2
hm=(a-b)/2
i/p a,b
o/p am,hm

import java.util.*;


public class Main 
{

	public static void main(String[] args)
	{
		double a,b,hm,am;
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter value of a & b");
		a=sc.nextDouble();
		b=sc.nextDouble();
		am=(a+b)/2;
		hm=(a-b)/2;
		System.out.println("Arithmetic mean="+am);
		System.out.println("Harmonic mean="+hm);

	}

}

20) Convert Fahrenheit to celcius & kelvin
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class CelciusAndKelvin {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		
		float F,C;
		double K;
		System.out.println("Enter F Value");
		Scanner Sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		F=Sc.nextFloat();
		C=(9/5)*(F-32);
		K=C+273.15;
		System.out.println("Celcius="+C);
		System.out.println("Kelvin="+K);
		
	}

}



21)
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class calculateper {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int marathi,English,Maths,History,Hindi,total;
		double per;
		System.out.println("Enter 5 Subject Marks:");
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter Marathi Marks:");
		marathi=sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("Enter English Marks:");
		English=sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("Enter Maths Marks:");
		Maths=sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("Enter History Marks:");
		History=sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("Enter Hindi Marks:");
		Hindi=sc.nextInt();
		total=marathi+English+Maths+History+Hindi;
		per=total/5;
		System.out.println("Total marks of 5 Subject:"+total);
		System.out.println("percentage:"+per+"%");
		
		
		

	}

}



22)accept basic salary from user & calculate hra,ta,da tax & gs
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p17 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int basicsalary;
		double hra,da,gs;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter yoour basic Salary:");
		basicsalary=s.nextInt();
		
		hra=basicsalary*0.20;
		da=basicsalary*0.40;
		gs=hra+da;
		System.out.println(" HRA="+hra+" DA="+da+" Gross Salary="+gs);
		

	}

}
23)
room l,b,h
- door l1,h1
- window l2,h2(2 window)
- floor(l*b)
calculate total area with roof is painted
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class program {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	 double l,b,h,l1,h1,l2,b2,total;
	 Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	 System.out.println("Enter l,b,h of room & l1,h2 for door & l2 ,h2 for window");
	 l=sc.nextDouble();
	 b=sc.nextDouble();
	 h=sc.nextDouble();
	 l1=sc.nextDouble();
	 h1=sc.nextDouble();
	 l2=sc.nextDouble();
	 b2=sc.nextDouble();
	 total=2*(l*b + b*h + l*h)-(l*b*h)-2*(l1*h1)-(l2*b2)-(l*b);
	 System.out.println("Area to paint ="+total);
	 
	 
	 }

}

24)swapping Using third variable

package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p15 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int a,b,c;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter  A & b:");
		a=s.nextInt();
		b=s.nextInt();
		System.out.println("Before Swapping "+"a="+a+"b="+b);
		c=a;
		a=b;
		b=c;
		System.out.println("After Swapping "+"a="+a+"b="+b);
		
		
	}

}

25)without Using third variable swapping 
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class withoutthirdvaraibale {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		 int a,b;//a=23 b=56
         Scanner sc=new Scanner (System.in);
         System.out.println("Enter A & b");
         a=sc.nextInt();
         b=sc.nextInt();//a=20 b=10
         System.out.println( "Before Swapping" +  " A="+a +"&" +" b="+b);
         a=a+b;// a=30
         b=a-b;//b=10
         a=a-b;//a=20
         System.out.println( "after Swapping" +  "  A="+a +"&" +" b="+b);
		 }
}
         
26)i/p h,m,s
o/p seconds
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class conversion2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
        int h,m,s;
        Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
        System.out.println(" Enter a hour & Minute& seconds:");
        h=sc.nextInt();
        m=sc.nextInt();
        s=sc.nextInt();
        s=(h*3600)+(m*60)+s;
        System.out.println("Seconds:"+s);
	}

}

27)
i/p km
o/p m

package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p18 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
        double km,m,cm;
        Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
        System.out.println("Enter Km :");
        km=s.nextDouble();
        m=km*1000;
        cm=m*100;
        System.out.println("kilomiter="+km);
        System.out.println("m="+m);
        System.out.println("cm="+cm);
        
		
	}

}


28)
i/p liter
o/p ml
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class convertlitertomilliter {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int liter,mililiter;
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter A liter to conver Milimter");
		liter=sc.nextInt();
		mililiter=liter*1000;
		System.out.println(liter+"="+mililiter+"mililiter");
		int liter1,mililiter1;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter A Milimter to conver liter : ");
		mililiter1=s.nextInt();
		liter=mililiter1/1000;
		System.out.println("mililiter"+mililiter1+"liter="+liter);
		
	}

}

29)/1000
i/p meter
o/p km

package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class covertkmtom {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       int km,m;
       Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
       System.out.println("Enter km");
       km=sc.nextInt();
       m=km*1000;
       System.out.println("M="+m);
       int km1,m1;
       Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
       System.out.println("Enter  m to convert kilometer ");
       m1=sc.nextInt();
       km1=m1%1000;
       System.out.println(m1+"meter"+km1+"kilometer");
		
		
	}

}


30)Accept seconds from user & display it in h:m:s format

package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class conversion {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int s,h,m,s1,a;
	       Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	       System.out.println("Enter seconds :");
	       s=sc.nextInt();
	       h=s/3600;//
	       a=s%3600;
	       m=a/60;
	       s1=a%60;
	       System.out.println(h+":"+m+":"+s1);
	}

}
31)Accept amount from user 
i/p 8888
o/p
2000*4=8000 SOP("2000*"+twot+"="+(2000*towt));
500*1=500
200*1=200
100*1=100
50*1=50
20*1=20
10*1=10
5*1=5
2*1=2
1*1=1
______________
total=8888

package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Rupees {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int fivehundred=500,twohundred=200,onehundred=100,fifty=50,twenty=20,ten=10,five=5,two=2,one=1,amount,total=0;
		Scanner Sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter Amount :");
		amount=Sc.nextInt();
		int a=amount/ fivehundred;
		total=fivehundred*a;
	    System.out.println( fivehundred+"*"+a+"="+(fivehundred*a));
	    int remaining=amount-(fivehundred*a);//1888-1500=388
	    int b= remaining/twohundred;//388/200=1
	   total=total+twohundred*b;
	    System.out.println( twohundred+"*"+b+"="+(twohundred*b));
	    remaining=remaining-(twohundred*b);//388-200=188
	    int c= remaining/onehundred;//188/100=1
	    total=total+onehundred*c;
	    System.out.println( onehundred+"*"+c+"="+(onehundred*c));
	    remaining=remaining-(onehundred*c);//188-100=88
	    int d=remaining/fifty;//88/50=1
	    total=total+fifty*d;
	    System.out.println(fifty+"*"+d+"="+(fifty*d));
	    remaining= remaining-(fifty*d);//88-50=38
	    int e=remaining/twenty;//38/20=1
	    total=total+twenty*e;
	    System.out.println(twenty+"*"+e+"="+(twenty*e));
	    remaining=remaining-(twenty*e);//38-20=18
	    int f=remaining/ten;//18/10=1
	    total=total+(ten*f);
	    System.out.println(ten+"*"+f+"="+(ten*f));
	    remaining=remaining-(ten*f);//18-10=8
	    int g=remaining/five;//8/5=1
	    total=total+(five*g);
	    System.out.println(five+"*"+g+"="+(five*g));
	    remaining=remaining-(five*g);//8-5=3
	    int h=remaining/two;//3/2=1
	    total=total+(two*h);
	    System.out.println(two+"*"+h+"="+(two*h));
	    remaining=remaining-(two*h);//3-2=1
	    int i= remaining/one;
	    total=total+(one*i);
	    System.out.println(one+"*"+i+"="+(one*i));
	    System.out.println(amount+"="+total);
	    
		
	}

}
32)Accept 4 digit no from user & reverse it 
1234
4321
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class reverse {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n,a,b,c,d;
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter Number=");
		n=sc.nextInt();
	      a=n%10;
	      n=n/10;
	      b=n%10;
	      n=n/10;
	      c=n%10;
	      n=n/10;
	      d=n%10;
		System.out.println(a+""+b+""+c+""+d);	
	}

}

33)	Write a program to find the square and cube of a given number?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p3 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int number;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter Number =");
	    number=s.nextInt();
	    int square=number*number;
	    int cube=number*number*number;
	    System.out.println("Square Of"+number+"="+square);
	    System.out.println("cube Of"+number+"="+cube);
		

	}

}

34)Write a program to find the square root of a given number (use sqrt () function)?Math.sqrt(a)
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p4 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		double n1;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter number :");
		n1=s.nextInt();
		System.out.println(Math.sqrt(n1));

	}

}

35)Write a program to find the area and perimeter of a square?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p5 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a,area,Perimeter;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter A value:");
		a=s.nextInt();
		area=a*a;
		Perimeter=4*a;
		System.out.println("Area of Square="+area);
		System.out.println("Perimeter of Square="+Perimeter);


	}

}

36)Write a program to find the area of a sphere?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p7 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int r;
		 double pi=3.14,area;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter R value:");
		r=s.nextInt();
		area=4*pi*(r*r);
		System.out.println("Area Of Sphere :"+area);
	}

}

38)Write a program to find the volume of a cylinder?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p8 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
				int r,h;
				 double pi=3.14,volume ;
				Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
				System.out.println("Enter R  & H value:");
				r=s.nextInt();
				h=s.nextInt();
				volume=pi*(r*r)*h;
				System.out.println("Volume Of Cylider :"+volume);
				
	
	}

}

39)Write a program to find the your age in days?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p11 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int age,days;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter age");
		age=s.nextInt();
		
		days=age*365;
		System.out.println("Age In days="+days);
		

	}

}


40)	Write a program to find the simple interest and compound interest?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p9 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		double si,Principal,Rate,Time,ci;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter Principle ,Rate,Time :");
		Principal=s.nextDouble();
		Rate=s.nextDouble();
		Time=s.nextDouble();
		si=Principal*Rate*Time;
		ci=Principal * (Math.pow((1 + Rate / 100), Time)); 
		System.out.println("Simple Intrest ="+si);
		System.out.println("Compound Intrest ="+ci);

	}

}

41)The total mechanical energy of a particle is given by e=mgh+(1/2) mv^2?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p10 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int m,g,h,v,e;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter m,g,h,v ");
		m=s.nextInt();
		g=s.nextInt();
		h=s.nextInt();
		v=s.nextInt();
		e=(m*g*h)+(1/2)*(m*v*v);
		System.out.println("E="+e);

	}
42)A milk vendor buys milk at the rate of 3.25/- the then adds a liter of water for every 4 liters of milk and sells the water milk at the rate of 4.15/1t. calculate the gain for milk vendor?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p13 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		double milkvendorbuysmilk,buysmilkrate=3.25,sellmikrate=4.15;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter milk quantity:");
		milkvendorbuysmilk=s.nextDouble();
		
		double totalbuymilkrate=milkvendorbuysmilk*buysmilkrate;
		System.out.println("Milk vendor buys milk rate :"+totalbuymilkrate);
		System.out.println("Milk vendor added l liter water for 4 liter milk");
		double addingwaterinmilk=milkvendorbuysmilk/4;
		 milkvendorbuysmilk=milkvendorbuysmilk+addingwaterinmilk;
		 System.out.println("Milk vendor sells the milk 4.15");
          double   totalprofitaftersells= milkvendorbuysmilk*sellmikrate;
          System.out.println( "total milk sells amount="+totalprofitaftersells);
		 System.out.println("milk vendor profit="+(totalprofitaftersells-totalbuymilkrate));
		
		
		
		

	}

}
43)Given the coordinates of two points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2). Write a program to find the distance between these two points?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p16 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int x1,x2,y1,y2,distance;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter x1,x2,y1,y2");
		x1=s.nextInt();
		x2=s.nextInt();
		y1=s.nextInt();
		y2=s.nextInt();
		distance=((x2-x1)*(x2-x1))+((y2-y1)*(y2-y1));
		System.out.println(" distance between two points:"+Math.sqrt(distance));
		
		}

}


44)Rajeshâ€™s basic salary is input through the keyboard. His D.A. is 40% of basic salary, and
H.R.A. is 20% of basic salary. Write a program to calculate his gross salary?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p17 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int basicsalary;
		double hra,da,gs;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter yoour basic Salary:");
		basicsalary=s.nextInt();
		
		hra=basicsalary*0.20;
		da=basicsalary*0.40;
		gs=hra+da;
		System.out.println(" HRA="+hra+" DA="+da+" Gross Salary="+gs);
		

	}

}

45)	Write a program which accepts the amount in dollars and convert into rupees?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p19 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int dollars;
		double rupees;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter doller to convert ruppes:");	
		dollars=s.nextInt();
		rupees=dollars*83.97;
		System.out.println("dollars="+dollars+"="+rupees+"rupees");
		}

}

46)Write a program to read your address and print it?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p20 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		String Address;
		Scanner S=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter your Address:");
		Address=S.nextLine();
		System.out.println(" your Address is:"+Address);
		
	}

}

47)Write a program to print the area of triangle if b and h values are given?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p21 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		float b,h,A;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter  B & H value :");
		b=s.nextFloat();
		h=s.nextFloat();
		 A = (b * h) / 2;
		 System.out.println("Area Of Triangle :"+A);
		
		
		
		

	}

}
48)Write a program to print the area of triangle if three sides are given?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p22 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		double a,b,c, area,s;
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter Three Sides Values");
		a=sc.nextDouble();
		b=sc.nextDouble();
		c=sc.nextDouble();
		
		  s = (a + b + c) / 2;
		 System.out.println("semiconductor:"+s);
	       area = Math.sqrt(s *(s - a)*(s - b)*(s - c));
	      
	     System.out.println("Area of triangle 3 sides:"+area );
	     
			

	}

}

49)Write a program to read the marks of 3 subjects and display the total, per?
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class calculateper {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int marathi,English,Maths,total,avg;
		double per;
		System.out.println("Enter 5 Subject Marks:");
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter Marathi Marks:");
		marathi=sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("Enter English Marks:");
		English=sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("Enter Maths Marks:");
		Maths=sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("Enter History Marks:");
		
		total=marathi+English+Maths;
		per=total/3;
		System.out.println("Total marks of 3 Subject:"+total);
		System.out.println("avg:"+avg);
		
		
		

	}

}
50) Check Number is positive or negative
package Orangeit;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class p24 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int number;
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter number :");
		number=s.nextInt();
		if(number>0)
		{
			System.out.println(number+"is positive number");
		}
	else if(number<0)
		{
			System.out.println(number+"is negative number");
		}
	else
	{System.out.println(number+"is zero");
		
	}
		
		
	}

}
